owners.sports_interests: Enjoys badminton, table tennis, volleyball, and carroms
owners.family_impact: Inspired his daughter to compete in an Under-14 national throwball championship organized by SGFI
owners.philosophy: Believes sports impart valuable lessons in teamwork, discipline, and friendship
owners.bio: Saravanan is a passionate sports enthusiast who has been involved in various sports activities throughout his life. He brings his technical expertise and love for sports to the team.

owners.philosophy: I strongly believe that sports brings neighbours together and let's us make some great connections, some of which last a long time.
owners.bio:
I strongly believe that sports brings neighbours together and let's us make some great connections, some of which last a long time. For me, PBEL has been the best home as I made some of my best friends in life through sports.

For my team, I hope that more than anything else some of us will become closer neighbours than before and enjoy playing the games together. Being the winning team will of course be the icing on the cake

owners.profession: Supply Chain Operations Professional, widely known as Sreeni in the PBEL community
owners.sports_interests: Actively plays kabaddi, volleyball, and handball
owners.sports_background: Introduced to Kho Kho at age 13, sparking his lifelong passion for outdoor sports
notable_achievements: Represented Andhra Pradesh in Under-17 Volleyball
Captained district teams in Kho Kho and Volleyball to championship titles
Honored as Best Outgoing Sports Person at NIT Calicut
owners.bio: Sreeni has been a sports enthusiast since childhood and has represented his state in various competitions. His passion for sports drives him to promote sporting activities in the community.

owners.profession: NIS Certified & World Athletic Level-1 Coach; accomplished international athlete
owners.sports_background: Medalist at state, national, and international levels
owners.philosophy: Emphasizes dedication, perseverance, and continuous improvement in sports and life
owners.sports_interests: Focuses on combining her athletic experience with a passion for developing emerging talent
owners.bio: Subhamitra brings her extensive experience as an international athlete to mentor and guide young talent. Her coaching philosophy emphasizes both technical skills and mental strength.

owners.profession: IT Engineer with a lifelong enthusiasm for sports
owners.sports_background: Competed in cricket at district and divisional levels. Enjoyed playing table tennis and basketball during his youth
owners.sports_interests: Transitioned to long-distance running; completed his first full marathon in under five hours
owners.team_role: Serves as the race director for the PBEL Winter Marathon, continually chasing new goals
owners.bio: Romesh combines his technical expertise with his passion for sports. He has been instrumental in organizing various sporting events in the community.

owners.sports_interests: Deeply devoted to football, which he views as a way of life
owners.family_impact: Uses the discipline and competitive spirit from football to excel in running and other pursuits
owners.philosophy: Believes that athletic dedication is key to personal excellence both on and off the field
owners.bio: Anish's love for football has shaped his approach to life and business. He brings strategic thinking and team-building skills to his role as a team owner.

owners.profession: Former banker and former bank union president, bringing strong leadership experience
owners.sports_interests: Active table tennis player with a passion for the game
notable_achievements: Secured second place in a recent doubles tournament
owners.philosophy: Committed to mentoring and building a balanced team to nurture young talent and new entrants
owners.team_role: Known as Raju in the PBEL community
owners.bio: Rajendra (Raju) brings his leadership experience from banking to sports management. He is dedicated to creating opportunities for young talent to flourish.

owners.sports_background: Professional badminton player with competitive experience at national and district levels
owners.philosophy: Sports captures the essence of dedication and perseverance. When it comes to team sports like volleyball, one person can be a key ingredient on a team but one person cannot make a team.
owners.bio: Sraveen is a professional badminton player who has competed at various levels, earning medals in CBSE National, Southzone, and Hyderabad district competitions. His philosophy emphasizes the importance of teamwork in sports, recognizing that while individual talent is valuable, true success comes from collective effort and collaboration.

owners.sports_background: Cricket enthusiast, played for university and currently active player of PBEL Cricket team
owners.bio: PraveenRaj is a dedicated cricket enthusiast with experience playing at the university level. He is currently an active member of the PBEL Cricket team. His straightforward philosophy of 'GO ALL IN' reflects his commitment to giving maximum effort and dedication to his sporting endeavors and team ownership.
